name: Stella Glow
description:
Bonus:
Download code for the theme
Stella Glow: “The Witches and Bubu”
for Nintendo 3DS.

For an entire millennium, the world
has been devoid of “song”. Only 5
Witches left in the land are able to
use “song magic.” However, Hilda the
Witch of Destruction plans to eliminate
the other Witches and the world with
her curse. Alto and the Regnant
Knights must now do all they can to
stop Hilda, starting with recruiting the
other Witches.
